amendment.description: To improve the provision relating to clarification of authority of military legal assistance counsel.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2493 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2493 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12593) To improve the provision relating to clarification of authority of military legal assistance counsel.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2493 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2493 proposed by Senator Warner.
